content.detailedDescription:
It was sometime in the summer when i was anywhere between 9 and 11 years old.  ( i was born in 1986).  my nieghbors and best friends had a neighborhood party.  the kids were outside, the parents were inside.  this was around the time that x-files was really popular and one of the boys had just received a telescope.  we decided to do a "sky watch" and look for ufo's, but that got old quickly because a) we were kids and b) we didnt' think we would actually see anything.  at one point, maybe around 7pm, i went back to the telescope to look through it and see what i could see.  my friend's house sits on a hill that overlooks a valley.  at the other end of the valley i could see what looked like an airplane, but only because it had lights (blue, red, white).  called my friends over, "it's a plane."  so we went back to playing in the yard.  maybe an hour later i went back to the telescope.  the thing i had been looking at was still in the same spot.  over an hour it would have moved somewhere if is had been a plane, or even a star/planet for that matter.  but it was still really far away so we when back to playing.  maybe another hour later we went to look in the telescope again and the object was much closer, maybe half the distance it had been previously, but still too far away to have been an airplane.  this intrigued our creative minds so we all sat down on the back porch, put the telescope aside, and decided to watch it.  over the next hour, it was dark by now, it got closer and closer ever so slowly until it became so close that it literally flew over the tree line at the edge of the yard, no more than a hundred feet away.  it was as if it knew we were watching it and was letting us get a good look.  it was egg-shaped and looked like what i would compare to brushed-steel.  around the center there were flashing lights, flashing in no particular order, all different colors, not just the red, blue, and white we had observed before.  it was no bigger than a vw beetle.  it made no sound.  my friend (who was my age) and i ran inside as fast as we could.  i sat with my dad, terrified, and said nothing.  my friend ran to his parents and said nothing as well.  my brother, his brother, and several of our other friends ran after the object and returned 15-20 minutes later.  their faces were blank and they said nothing.  when my friend and i asked them about where they had been they got angry and said it was nothing.
the really messed up part comes in only a few years ago.  my friends and i had never discussed it, but i still could not get it out of my mind.  enough time had past that i thought maybe it had been a dream.  i was visiting my best friend from that night (who had since moved) and pulled him aside.  i said something like, "please don't laugh or think i'm crazy, but i have to run something by you because i don't know if it was a dream or it was real and it's really bothering me."  he says, "what?"  i say, "do you remember when were were younger, like 10 maybe, and we did a sky watch and thought we might have seen something?"  his face goes white and says, "i thought that might have been a dream too."  we were so excited we quickly ran to ask our brothers if they too remembered that night we never talked about.  scary thing is, they don't.  they don't remember it and they even got upset with us that we were trying to play a trick on them.  so the way i see it, my friend and i ran inside and remember the whole episode.  the guys who ran after it and were gone for 15-20 minutes, don't remember it at all.
i think about his event often and quite frankly, i wish it had never happened.  i hope i never see anything like that again, but to this day, i have to sleep with the windows locked shut and blinds down.  maybe it's irrational, but i have never been so scared in my life.
unfortunately we don't have any pictures.  i wish we did though because they would probably be insanely good.
content.summary: Super elaborate story, over several hours, ufo came closer to the house accross the valley until it crossed nearly over the house, only a several tens of feet away

content.detailedDescription:
It was sometime during eleven o' clock pm and i was in my room trying to fall asleep thinking about the roswell crash. while my eyes wander around i see this bright disc like object in the sky it was about half a mile away and it was kind of rotating counter clock wise and has yellow and red lights around it. but it was to far away for me to see anything else. but in the beginning i did not notice it to be a ufo so i thought it was a wishing star but i was 10 so i made a wish and i layed back down onto my bed and kept staring at it and after a little while i closed my eyes for less than 5 seconds and i looked outside the window again to see what it was doing because i believe in the paranormal and the most mysterious of mysteries and i start to see it rotating and floating from left to right very slowly but it pretty much stayed in the exact spot of when i made my wish. but being 10 years old i think it was just a plane which i highly doubt. so i lay back down again and then this sort of sensational feeling rose threw my body and i wondered if it had anything to do with the rotating object, so i look out the window one last time and i see it moving upward then differently then most ufo "blast offs" to lighting speed, but it starts to disappear from the right side and moves down to the point were it stops to disappear and there is a giant green flash and then it accelerates to lighting speeds into the sky. i ran outside amazed by this occurance and now im a 13 year old trying to become an expert on ufo's and im trying to research them and i have even tried to get abducted by the nordic alien species. because they are the good aliens instead of the greys that wish to perform a bunch of surgeries on you and make you drink harmful acids. but i also wish i could get an implant from an alien to see what it does to my body and if i can i would take it out after a year and see what it looks like and maybe try some experiments on it at aufo research center.
so if anybody wants me to take risky jobs to track down aliens then im free for any job.
content.summary: The ufo was rotating.

content.detailedDescription:
I was a little kid, only about 6 years old.

i was abducted in the middle of the night.   the thing about it was i was not really scared by the incident.   i had never heard of ufos or aliens, as described in today's pop culture.  i was a very curious kid and willing cooperated with my abductors.

i referred to my abductors as "ant people."  because the beings looked like "big ants" to me.   i told my parents and they just laughed.   i never felt that i was harmed in any way and grew up, as a very happy normal guy.

the ant people did what can best be explained as a medical examination on me.  they did not talk to me but, they did smile.   i was not a bit scare.  the only uncomfortable thing about the experience was i made to sit in a fetal position, at one point, without moving, it was very uncomfortable to me.  the beings were as tall as i was (as a kid).

i was never into the ufo thing but, one day when i was around 18 years old - i was hanging out at my friends house and he had a paperback about ufos and in the book there was a drawings of aliens - and i saw the ant people. the drawings looked exactly as i remembered.  i was pretty freaky.

i never told anyone about this before.  other than my parents when i was kid.   it really happened!

today, i am 39 years old, an ivy league educated lawyer.  i am a pretty serious guy but, i believe!   i believe in aliens!

take care.
content.summary: Abduction

content.detailedDescription: I couldnt sleep so i walked over to my window and looked out i immediately noticed this tremendously bright star more brillant then i had ever seen as i continued to watch it , it began changing colors , red, blue, green, white...(by this time i am scared to death and hiding behind the curtains lol) then all of a sudden it darted straight up say about 100 yrds or so then it got bigger and you could see it brighter then ever before with large strobe lights that just kept blinking and then it began to fade out as if it was moving away and was gone...  i dont know what it going on in kokomo but if anyone else could tell me they saw it too please post!
content.summary: I couldnt sleep so i walked over to my window and looked out i immediately noticed this tremendously bright star more brillant then i had ever seen as i continued to watch it , it began changing colors , red, blue, green, white...Then all of a sudden

content.detailedDescription:
On wednesday june 18, 2008, i was watching tv at my place located at the deerbrook apartments in fishers.  i had my blinds open to my large windows to let the breeze in since it was a cool night. at about a little bit after 10 pm, i noticed a set of lights pass very slowly across the left window (in my living room) in the distance. now at the time, i did not think much of it because i figured it was a small aircraft (like a cessna) landing at the indianapolis municipal airport which is a half mile north of my residence on allisonville rd.  but then i saw another set of lights passing very slowly across my right window at about what appeared to be the same altitude as the set of lights from the left window.  this seemed odd to me 2 aircraft flying so close to each other (i work for the airlines).  so i looked out the right window and i saw 3 strobing objects in the sky in a triangular formation.  i thought i was seeing things.  i went outside with my binoculars to make a better observation from my porch.  when i went outside, i got a good view of the following (with and without binoculars):

1.  3 objects in a perfect triangular formation "hovering" about 1000 feet off the ground.
2.  the distances between each set of strobing white lights (with hints of blue and red) was somewhere in the neighborhood of 300 to 400 feet.
3.  i was using a point of reference (a neighbor's chimney) and the objects appeared to hover there for about 10 minutes and then they began to very very slowly drift off in a northernly direction.
4.  the strobing lights were moving left to right from my vantage point (they could have been moving in a circular fashion but i could not observe that)
5.  most importantly:  i did not hear any sound!!!!!  (i know what a helicopter and an airplane sound like).  i did not hear anything eminate from these objects.

now the objects began to move away and eventually i lost sight of them from my porch. i went back inside stunned by what i observed.  this was clearly not a helicopter or aircraft.  unfortunately, i did not have a camera to take a snapshot of what i had seen.

please note:  there could have been an object or structure within the perimeter of the strobed lights.  if there was, i could not see it because it blended in with the night sky.
content.summary: Hovering triangular formation with white strobe lighting with hues of blue and red

content.detailedDescription: I am located about 3 miles northeast of o���hare. i checked out the sky on my lunch today...June 18th at around 2:10 pm....I swear to god...I have never seen anything in my life...I thought my eyes were playing tricks on me...I saw...A boomerang....Huge and low...It hovered, turned west and disappeared...Then about 15 minutes later...I saw a saucer shaped object head into a cloud formation at a high rate of speed.  i will take a drug test and a polygraph....I never saw anything until i wrote a screenplay called...'nightmare hall'...Then they started showing up....Man i wish i had a camera...Out there...But they were so quick....I never would have gotten a photo...But i swear they are showing up here all the time now....And i will produce evidence and post to this site for sure...I am going to work on it....Check it out���experimental or alien���it sure is fun to wonder.  once you see it���you will believe.  just watch the skies....Especially at night...I swear you will start to see something if you are in or near...Illinois....Most look like a star moving....But wait until it stops and hovers...And keep your eyes on it...And it will explode with a flash of light...And take off...It is totally amazing!!  never seen anything before....And now it is about 2 or 3 per night...Every single night since june 7th....I actually lost count.  most of them are way up there...So binoculars will help if you don't have 20-10 vision like me...But today...It was lower...And each was clear as a bell.  you could see it for sure....Now...Most of these are a bright orbs at night...And not venus...Which can be clearly viewed to the east right now....I want to tell my story...But i need evidence first...And i am not kidding....I am about to call ufo hunters or mufon to watch with me. as they will see something for sure...It happens nightly....But today was the first time i saw one during the day...You have to keep your mind and eyes open....And you will see one for sure...No doubt about it...I want someone else to confirm it....Please watch the skies...And comment if you see something...Take an hour at night....When you see the orb start to move...You will believe me. i guess it took a ufo conspiracy screenplay...For them to finally show up in my life.  today i jumped up out of my lawnchair when i saw the boomerang...It was huge...And black...Fifteen minutes later was my first flying saucer too...What the hell is going on?  no way anyone would believe me...Until you see it for yourself....I swear i saw what i saw...& i cannot  change that.  no one believes me yet...But they will when they see one.  i have waited my entire life to see one...And they are here for sure.
content.summary: Boomerang and disc spotted near o'hare within 15 minutes of each other.

content.detailedDescription: I was on my grandmothers swingset, and i was thinking and watching the clouds. i saw at first what i thought was a airplane.But i was farmiliar to ufology and didn`t see a exhaust trail.Which indicated it was now a unidentified flying object.Then  more came out, three, then two objects.There were there then five.I walked further into the yard and looked into the opening.I quickly got on my bike, and went up the road and followed them. i only saw them shortly because there was a giant cloud to the south.And they blended into the cloud.But i wouldn`t be able to see them anyways to the south because there was the forest. i assure you this really happened.
content.summary: I was on my grandmothers`s swingset, and i saw a ufo.

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting a a train crossing on 21st street n. and i looked up at the sky and say a bunch of bright glowing glights that were radiating blue and red pulsed.  i pulled over and me and my 2 passengrs got out of the van a started counting the objects and stopped at 42.  it was as if there was a web of them over wichita.  we watched them pulse red and blue out of the white lights and move around slowly.  we decided after about 5 minutes of lying on the van pointing to drive the last 3 blocks home.  when we got there we looked up and there were so many clouds that you could not see anything but an occasional one peaking out from the clouds.  i started back home down 21st toward hillside and i could see in front of me at the tree line one of the objects traveling at about 40 at about a quarter mile in front of me on my left.  i turned on hillside and went home to get my camera.  i returned to the wsu parking lot and started to take pictures of the bright moving lights.  i was only able to take 3 pictures and the new batteries in my camera were dead.  i tried 3 other sets and they were dead to.  but i still managed in those 3 pictures to get something clearly in 2.  i was looking at a very bright pulsing light but in the pictures they appear as a grey ball.  but when you zoom in it is a top looking lighted object with something coming out of the top.  i went out the next night and captured at least 20 or more ufo's that are all different when you zoom in and they all photographed as a grey ball or they came out looking like a ghost orb.  all you need to do is zoom in as far as you can on the grey balls or invert the colors to see all the invisible orbs to the eye that are there also.  i am going back out tonight.  notice that there are no stars in the sky.
content.shape: Bullet,  Missile,  Cone,  Diamond,  Disc,  Oval,  Sphere,  Other
content.summary: Many ufo's over wichita, kansas

content.detailedDescription:
There were 4 of us on a weekend astronomy/ufo watch in the groom lake area , parked at the white mailbox, on et highway (375), 20 miles from the lilaleinn in rachel.
we set up "camp" at the famed "black mailbox"(now white). of steve medlen, erected our telescope for summer sky observation and kept eyes out for anything else that may have business in the area.
at 11:20 pm, we swung the scope around to face north to observe a binary star.
my friend then said, "what do we have here?" i looked in the direction,and immediately saw a pulsating red light which appeared to be spherical in shape. since this is a strict "no fly" zone(for most aircraft anyway), it had my complete attention. it remained stationary for about a minute,changed color to a white pulsation, then dove at an approximate angle downward of 30 degrees.We lost sight of it for a moment, when my friend flashed it with a red laser pointer. almost immediately it reappeared and changed to the red pulsation, perhaps in response to the laser greeting.
when in the new position, it changed to a white pulsation, then back to red.
about 45 seconds later, it zigged up to a higher position, sat there for about 15 seconds more , then took off at a 40 degree angle up and away! (phenomenal acceleration!)
i am a mufon member, #12495, presently studying the field investigation manual.
my friend had a ce3 while in the air force in europe at a "nuke" base.
i have had a very close encounter before, which i will not discuss here.
it was quite exciting, as this was my first sighting!
thanks for the mufon forum.
content.summary: Sighting of pulsating sphere above mountain ridge at the white mailbox, hwy. 375, 20 miles out of rachel, nv. it used the classic "zig-zag' maneuver, and changed colors from red to white.

content.detailedDescription:
My number is(818) 903-9354 the sphere was red, silver, and invisible. it changed altitude and direction at will, it was at about 1000 to 3000 feet, it was small although scale was hard to determine having worked with aircraft in the past the sphere was about 30ft in diameter, it was heading south along the 134fwy in north hollywood on 6/18/2008 at 5:50 pm  on wednesday. let me know where more info on this craft can be found because of the distance of the sphere i cannot say if it was a black budget craft or an true ufo, but my guess is that it is a true ufo.
thank you in advance for any info you may have about this sphere, more data about the sphere is at the website ufosnw.Com  thanks again.

david  :)
content.summary: Amazing

content.detailedDescription:
i live very close to logan airport in boston, ma i was looking out my window saw an object.It was orbed shaped.I have a view of alot of towns around me. i like to sit outside on my baconly and watch the plane come and go.  it seemed  odd and nothing i ever seen before. i have seen planes come and go for 5 years.It traveled from south to north faster than a plane. straight up. it then went from east to west faster than any plane ever i saw.
it was like a half colored on one side...Left...Gold..And clear on the other side,right... but you can still tell it was an orb.
i lost sight of it when it passed my building.
content.summary: Sphere out my 5th story building over looking boston

content.detailedDescription: this was told to me after i got home from work, my grand daughter heard our dog barking out of the basement door which is glass. she let him out and he went to the edge of the fenced yard and looked up barking at this thing, my grand daughter said she saw an enormous round object,it covered the sky where she was and its main body was orange, and she described it as having star shapes all around the thing, which i think was just the way the lights looked on the edge of the thing, she is 10 and she didnt say look i saw a ufo, she never has really heard of anything like a ufo, anyway she said it just disappeared and then reapeared a ways off before it disappeared behind the trees, she said it was never up in the sky, just over the tree line and not very far away. i asked her to draw a picture of it and it was as she described it. i know she saw it. i would like to know if anyone else saw this in the southeast kentucky area.
content.summary: Orange main body, with colored lights

content.detailedDescription:
I didn���t see the object with my naked eye.  i only noticed on 3 of the photos i took of the full moon tonight that there was a strange red object on them, on two of which there is also a white light.  when zooming in, it does not look like a plane (this route is also where the planes come down to land at the nearby airport - arrecife).  i wonder if anyone can tell me what the h*ll that is???

i am attaching the high res original pictures, sorry about the size!
content.summary: Strange red object in the sky

content.detailedDescription:
I was on my kicthen roof having a smoke (no smoking house,and i like to sit up there and watch the planes go by),when i noticed these 2 lights,as you can see in the video.They were far too close together to be planes,and making no noise so they weren't helicopters. i see planes and things every night,i know what they look like. anyway,the one on the right fades away first,but what the camera doesn't pick up,is that it fades to an orange,and moves off to the right. the other one stays for about a minute,fades to orange and then sort of goes up a little bit before vanashing.

i do live near an airport,but these were like no planes i've seen before,firstly,the lights were massive compared to an aircraft light. like huge stars.

anyway,enjoy!!
content.summary: 2 orbs of light,1 goes orange and moves to the left,the other dissapears.

content.detailedDescription: Labor day weekend 2006 in painesville ohio early afternoon, friends, family and i were hanging out in the yard grilling and playing frisbee etc. the sky was perfectly blue. i noticed a bright metallic reflection in the sky and peaked up out of curiousity. what we all saw, for more than 30 minutes, was a large white/grey, circular object at approximately 10000 - 15,000 feet altitude with 2 smaller metallic objects moving around it similar to the movement of bees. compared to jet airliners that fly in the area constantly, i'd say that the large white object was 5x bigger than a standard plane. the two metallic objects flying around it, were similar size to a commercial airliner and did not follow straight paths like a plane would have to. the metallic reflection on the two smaller objects was really intense, and much brighter than any normal reflections coming from planes in the area. their strange movement kind of scared me to be honest. the large white/grey disc moved really slowly from north to south in a straight line and eventually fell below the tree line out of site. the white object was not very reflective and was kind of hard to see with the blue sky background. without the metallic objects, it may not have been seen. at the time we all were sort of mesmerized by it. a few of us continued to watch it, and a few of us tried to view it with binoculars but were unable to pinpoint it due to the bright blue sky. no pictures, or video were taken, but similar reports from mentor, ohio the following january hit the news and were very similar to what we all saw. my current feeling is that the white object was nothing of earth origin, but the metallic objects around it could have been military planes that were trying to get up close for a view. there was no sound the whole time, but that is the norm for planes at that altitude. i never do hear them. mothership is a word that comes to mind especially if the smaller objects were of unknown origin as well.
content.summary: Round object slowly moved across the sky

content.detailedDescription: i was coming home from work on il-14, when i looked north above grayville, il and saw two or three of the amber orbs.  first one appeared, then one came below and to the left of it.  possibly another, it's been six months ago since then.  i continued to watch the sky until i got home.  when i arrived i got out my camera and tripod.  i believe it was about twenty minutes before i saw anything else.  the description is exactly the same as my reports from 9/11/07 and 9/12/07 in indiana, they are the only two on that date if you wish to look them up.  the difference in this sighting is that i could see small dots of light splitting off from the orbs as they lit up, and continuing on in the sky to repeat this again. the orbs lasted only seconds on this occasion, and there were about eight in all; most were caught on tape.  the following has been recoded to wmv9, thus losing some quality; however the important aspects can still be seen.   any questions should be sent to myeyeshaveseen@hotmail.Com
content.summary: Amber colored balls of light, object visible on cam moving between orbs and lighting them.

content.detailedDescription:
While taking our dog out this morning just before 8:00 a.M. i noticed a bright reflection from something high in the sky moving slowing from south to north coming just over step mountain. since planes sometimes fly this route on their way to the salt lake city airport, i watched the object thinking it was a plane. the object, however, zigzagged twice forming a sort of "w" in the sky. at that point i knew it wasn't an airplane, but thought it might be a helicopter since camp williams is just slightly to the south of us.

when the object next executed a lazy arc flying toward the west, i knew it wasn't a helicopter. at all times, what i was seeing was the reflection of the object from the rising sun - that is, the sun coming from the east, the object slightly to the west of me, it must have created the perfect angle of reflection for me to see it.

the object then remained stationary for about four minutes, then it flew slightly south and seemed to recede becoming smaller and dimmer. it looked like a small, bright star at that point. during the four minutes, i ran and got my husband to observe the object, but by the time he came outside, the object was quite dim, and unless you knew exactly where to look, it was hard to see.

i kept watching until i could no longer see the tiny, bright "star". given its motion, the object was not an airplane, not a helicopter, and not, as my husband wondered, a satellite. i feel quite privileged to have seen this.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Zigzag motion, arc-shaped trajectory, receding into space all over herriman, ut!

content.detailedDescription: I took my dogs out because they kept going to the back door and acting strange.  i went onto the back deck and had an overwhelming feeling of being watched.  i looked up in the sky and saw a round bright object i thought might be a star, but felt very strange like i knew someone or something was watching me.  i picked up on the object right away and felt intimidated so i turned the back flood light on.  the object started moving very fast and then disappeared like turning a light off.  i still felt like i was being watched so i got the dogs in the house and locked everything up.  this is not the first time this has happened with seeing strange objects in the sky.  it is always in the direction over the bay.  i have caught several things on camera that i cannot explain.  i never read too much activity in md area though, so i sort of keep quiet about it and just continue to observe and keep the photos.
content.summary: Round bright object

content.detailedDescription: On may 25 2008 at approximately 19:45hrs while conducting a routine surveillence of the ( northwest sky )i was in my back yard standing on a 15foot latter so that i could see better and video tape any strange activity, and while my video cam was rolling a very large disk appeared on my monitor i was able to video tape some very interesting footage but only for about 1minute my cam stoped picking up its image but i continued to observe its behaviour it changed shapes then it hovered for about 3minutes before totally just disapearing.... there was no dought it was a ufo i have been observing disks and star like ufos for many yrs and its like anything else you just get good at identifying objects when you have been doing it long enough. on june 15 2008 at approximately 1930hrs my wife and i and our next door neighbor a retired school teacher like to go for walks on our block where we live this night however would be different as the three of us were walking i had a feeling like we were all being watch so i looked up at a very clear and blue sunset to see a very bright star like object hovering only about 2,500 feet in the northern sky i stated look! and my wife and our friend looked up and there it was, it was so amazing! i ran to get my cam but when i returned it was gone but i have our friends eye wittness account and she was a skeptic before this happened.. she stated it changed from a star to a disk and at a snap of the finger it was gone.... it left us all feeling very shayken and very tense it took us all night to calm down... these events continue today i have tryed to make contact with the disclosure project people but no reply yet... the activity around this area is just off the hook i dont have all the equipment to record and document all this activity... i feel that some kinda of contact was trying to be made from the star like ufo to "me" because its happening all the time and i dont know what to do at this point? i have made contact with our local chanel 8 news people but i need a finished product to show them...So for now i just have mufon. hope to hear from you guys soon... thank you for your time and consideration regarding this case. jon
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Very dark disk moving very fast then stoping then changing shape then vanished.

content.detailedDescription: Ok here's the deal.I work as a security gaurd for trion security.I'm contracted to an office building couple doors down.3701 pender dr fairfax,va 22030.I do the 10pm to 6am shift sunday and monday night.Drive down the street all the way to the end,there is a cul de sac.On the right hand side is 3701 and you will see a 2 level parking garage.Anyways around 2am i noticed an object making passes over my site.2 solid non-blinking lights with a red oscillating light in the middle.No wings and no sound.Dead quiet.Upon the 3rd pass/fly by,i walked up on the parking garage and began signaling the object with my flashlight.This,no doubt,got it's attention.Really got it's attention.It made additional passes nearby,slowly,in an observation manner.Each time flying over head coming from different directions but the focus was where i was standing.On the 8th,9th,and 10th pass,it got really close.This is when i became nervous.This also gave me a chance to observe the object in great detail.The features were like what i previously stated also had no wings and when it turned it did not bank like a plane.It would turn in a sort of horizonatal arc.Again no sound.On the 9th pass the altitude was very low,it went out over the nearby treetops and made a u turn.It came back around for the final pass,slowly as i waved my flashlight around,making gestures with the light.It then went off over the treestops.This went on for 2 1/2 hours.I am going back out there either tommorow night or my next shift.I will bring stronger flashlight and recording equipment for proof.I may bring a witness as well.This location has a lot of activity(i had seen something on the night previous to that conncering to large objects around 3am but i will save that for another time)the goal here is to coax it even closer overhead to get a good shot maybe even try to get it to land,on top of the garage.Sounds crazy,i know but it is what it is.If you guys are interested in this experiment,email me back or come out here.We have plenty of activity.I will say though flashing these things with high powered flash lights,attract them out of curiousity being that most people don't do that ha ha.So that's it.Laters.
content.summary: Object made 10 fly by passes over parking garage when i signaled it with flashlight.

content.detailedDescription:
Was on my balcony around the time noted, was looking at the sky, and suddenly i saw a bullet looking bluish shape, very fast, came out of the blue, it was dark outside at night and still i could tell its color was blue, sparkling blue if could say that, and as it showed up it disappeared, and what scared me the most, there was an airplane above it, as i could tell from the angle, the plane kept going towards town. 
it was so fast and happened so quickly that i could not get the cam or the phone to take any pictures, and it didnt last long, no sounds or anything, just a blue light for few seconds, crossing the sky very fast, it crossed it what looked to me in a descending way, going down, and as if u blew on the candle, no more light and that was it !
content.summary: It was blue color, flashing, very fast and didnt last long

content.detailedDescription:
Ever since i was a little kid, i have watched the skies.  i love to star gaze, even if it makes my neck sore.  i have lived 5 minutes from o���hare airport for 32 years.   i know full well what a helicopter or plane
look and sound like.   i have seen just about every aircraft the military displays at over 20 air shows in my lifetime.  i have seen tons of meteors when i lived arizona for 8 years. on saturday, june 07, 2008 at 9:22 p.M., i saw a huge white orb brighter than the moon head directly over my house in a southeastern direction.   the orb was silent, it moved slowly and smoothly.  it was at a pretty high altitude, so the size of this thing was astonishing.  i reported the sighting to mufon and the national ufo reporting center.  ever since that night, i watched the same areas of the sky���hoping i would see it again.
i did see it again tonight, june 17, 2008 at 10:15 p.M.  i saw what i thought was a star just light up so bright, and move slowly downward, it hovered for a couple of seconds, and i could see the shape of the craft this time.  it was definitely triangular.  the light that came off light up the sky all around it like an electrical charge, and the color of the light was a very bright bluish-white.  after it hovered, it turned and took off an absolutely incredible rate of speed, and followed a commercial flight that was heading due north.  it easily caught up to the flight, and passed it up as if it were standing still. i have seen some weird things up in the sky, but this was by far the most unexplainable thing i have ever seen.    only the joint strike fighter lightening ii, a helicopter, or a harrier jet can hover like that.  all i know is���both times i have seen this thing it was silent.  it is my theory the only human thing i know of that could fly like that is���the air force/nasa experimental tr3-a or tr3-b ���night-walker���, which is part of the aurora program.  or it is an alien craft from another world.  a shooting star or meteor does not hover like that, and when i see them���they flash across the sky quickly.  i have never seen a meteor turn either.  i will be out there with a video camera from this night on.  i am located in park ridge, il, but perhaps worldwide���if you want to see what i am seeing, check the skies at night���find the big dipper star formation.  i have seen other orbs fly either due north through the big dipper, or just east of the big dipper.  you may dismiss it as a plane at a high altitude���until it stops up there.   they might deny it, but the o���hare radar has to be picking these things up���unless they are cloaked or stealth.  i am located about 3 miles northeast of o���hare. check it out���experimental or alien���it sure is fun to wonder.  once you see it���you will believe.
content.summary: Triangle hovered & flashed a beam of light & followed a plane

content.detailedDescription:
Dear sir madam
my name is oriel stainton and i hail from north island, new zealand
 
i believe i am being harrassed by an entity, that fits your desription as a ufo or entity or creature, i was wondering if you could investigate the evidence i have collected (over a period) and give me your point of view on these strange cicumstances.
 
i am assurred you have children we all do, in your presence just ask yourself "would you want this thing meddling and moving around your defenceless children, because i dont want it near me, 
 
the creature appeared in my life the day my father passed away (21 june 2006) it has been here eversince, please bring your attention to attachment labelled paranormal investigation 2 this article i got of the internet it depicts a strange storm that occured over new zealand the day my father died and this creature appeared, what it bassically states is that when the storm occured there was an enigmatic (mysterious) object hovering over new zealand like a supernova creating unusual gamma rays burst that pulsated over the earth in all directions, wrecking havoc the effects were felt half a world away, and the storm left scientists baffled, i swear black and blue when that storm occurred i could see the creature flying thru the sky drawing fantastical murals and wreaking havoc, it was skitzing out i tell you attacking me and everbody around me it attacked me it kept spitting and screaming at me when it spat you can feel it it howled "who are you bi***" "this is my house" "this is my house" it proclaimed to be a king and god, it scared the shit out of me i ended up in a pshciatrict unit 3 weeks after my father passed away the day he died i couldn't eat sleep when i arrived at hospital i was a skeletor,
 
anyways inspect the photographs i have shown them to a paranormal investigator and he mentioned to me matrixing, the only thing with that is not only do i see the pictures in the clouds, it draws pictures on walls in puddles of water any surface really, and like it goes behind people and you can see bright lights behind them like an aura sometimes bright pink sometimes bright white sometimes purple its scary, im too scared to look in the mirror when i brush my teeth at night because there it is the aura behind you, i know you probably think "what a load of hogswash, who is this maddy" but please be assured i would never lie to children or anyone for a matter of fact, two words to describe this creatures likeness blind rage
 
the attachment labelled paranormal pics
top photo 
where i put the pen mark can you see the mans face
then behind him looks like animals fighting
bottom photo
looks like a man face (side view)
with something covering his mouth
that just my opinion the person taking the strange photos
 
thank you for your time/awaiting your reply
with kindest regards
god bless you and your work
 
sincerely
 
 
 
oriel stainton
content.shape: Cross,  Egg,  Fireball,  Flash,  Star-like,  Unknown
content.summary: Wonderful, repulsive, insulting to the relationship between man and women

content.detailedDescription:
Me and my dad were coming home from muskegon michigan back in 1991 in the late summer time season, and when we were driving back home to benton harbor michigan usa, we saw a yellowish-blueish zig-zag object coming from the southwest direction at an anormous speed (in allegan county) near sagutuck, it was about 500 to 1000 feet up in the night sky, and it was gone and over us in our ford van in less than 5 to 10 seconds flat. 

then me and my dad at that time had to pull into the next near by rest area on highway us 31. we were pretty shaken about what we saw, so me and my dad got out at the rest area to walk around until we got a hold of our selfs and until we both were ready to head back onto the high way back home. my dad told my mom about it all, and we still, me and my dad remember the whole entire incedent till this day.

my dad was in the veitnam war back in the 60's era,
he drove tanks, jets, and hue's. he said that he still can not identify what that object could have possibly been, the object we saw did not come close to anything that was even near man flown, by either really anything to match with or even think upon that any government would use, especialy in the area where we saw the object. 

is there really any such object with such a high speed, and the fact that it zig-zaged at such an outgoing angel thru the sky at night. ?

we sure do not know what the object could have been.

there were no lights on the highway complete pitch dark, and no other cars on the highway at that time 1:00am  " not for many upon many miles at the most least ".
content.summary: Zig-zag yellow-blueish object in allegan michigan usa

content.detailedDescription:
Left las in b-757 with passengers at approx. 0100.  approaching blue mesa
noticed a large wedged shaped vehicle making a turn, toward my a/c.  the vehicle was in precise control and pulled up along side mine.  both my copilot and my self watched as the vehicle flew formation for several seconds, giving us full view of it's form.  the vehicle was at least as large as us and more mass.  observed windows, shape, and structure, vehicle was not smooth rather more locked like star wars vehicle, with structure outside. windows along side.  waslarger than b-757.  the vehicle after flying formation, pulled ahead sevveral miles, made a right turn right in front of us and accellerated then made a left 90 and pulled up to approx 60 and left our sight instantly!

the night was moon lite no chance for error.
there was no fire from exhaust, even when it accelerated vertical. also no wake turbs as the thing crossed right in front of my a/c at approx 5 miles.
we were doing over 600kts. 

the objects colors were matted dark grey top, and light grey bottom

the object pitched up to approx 60 and dissappeared!!!!!!!!!
content.summary: Fl 410 vehicle approached from aft left part 121 flight

content.detailedDescription: ��� my buddy was driving home and i was in the passenger seat.��� we were between county line rd. and main st, in greenwood, in.��� we just finished eating dinner with another friend, and we were all heading back home.��� randomly i looked up at the sky from the passenger seat.��� i saw two very intense bright amber-colored lights high above the sky.��� it looked like they would have been over the city of frankln or columbus in, which are��� approx. 7 and 20 miles from greenwood respectively.��� so i was looking south and saw these 2 lights.��� then a third light popped up out of nowhere.��� the three got into a clustered group and formed a nearly triangular shape.��� ��� i remember thinking up until then that it was road flares, because that was the only thing that it looked like it could have been(even though the lights appeared from thin air, unlike road flares).��� next four more of these lights showed up out of nowhere, just like the third light.��� the seven lights remained clustered, then they formed a diagonal line, very well organized i might add.��� this is when i started to get the goosebumps.��� after forming the line the seven got back into a spread out clustered formation, and many of them started to blink and flash.��� then they started to disappear.��� amazingly they all reappeared in different parts of the sky fractions of a second after they disappeared.��� it was like they were covering miles and miles of skyline in tenths of a second.��� they just kept disappearing and reappearing.��� i remember how upset we were when they were gone, then we would get really pumped up when they would reappear, it was an amazing sight.��� if i had to describe the light i would compare it to the way a large street light looks from a slight distance, however these lights were more intense and had a very high altitude.��� ��� the weird thing was that i called some local news affiliates from indianapolis, and i kept getting told it was a marine helicopter training exercise.��� oddly the police department knew nothing about the marine training exercise. these lights were not helicopters, unless they were helicopters that could disappear and reappear and not make a sound (if you see a helicopter you can hear it).��� also about 45 minutes after the spectacle helicopters started flying right by my apartment southbound, toward the area of the event.��� there were approximately 8 choppers total heading down there and they were all low and in a hurry.��� helicopters never fly around like that in my neck of the woods unless its emergency or news choppers.��� ��� some helpful information i could give would be that there is a small airport 2 miles west from where i first witnessed the lights.��� also there is a military training base (camp atterbury) about 20 minutes south from greenwood in.��� to my knowledge this base does not deal w/ military flight or aviation.��� i am a skeptical person and i tend to find rational worldly explanations for everything i hear and see.��� what i saw last night was either an extremely advanced form of human aviation, or some other form of aviation that i guess would not be human.��� i am not so concerned with it being terrestrial/extraterrestrial, i just want to know how those lights were moving and disappearing/reappearing like that.��� sorry to type so much but i am hoping someone gets on here that was in the same area last night, and can share their story, so i want to be as descriptive as possible.��� ��� in closing i want to say that the way they formed their patterns was odd.��� they went from two lights to three lights, and made a triangle.��� then four more appeared and the 7 made a diagonal line.��� then the spread clustering, and the dissappearing/reappearing.��� then it was like they worked back down to finish.��� they formed back into a cluster, then a diagonal line, then there were only two left (they left the triangle out at the end).��� i'm getting chills right now here at work as i am typing this.��� this is my first ever experience with anything like this, and i must say it was the oddest and most fascinating thing i have ever witnessed in my 24 years of existence.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: It started with two bright amber color lights high in the sky.  there ended up being seven of these lights total.

content.detailedDescription:
On the evening of friday june 13th, 2008 my wife, sister and i witnessed a ufo while driving east on highway 375 (otherwise known as the extraterrestrial highway). approximately 9:30 pm, after passing groom lake road, my sister saw an object in the sky, south of us. i pulled over the side of the highway and quickly exited the car. 20-25 miles south of us, over some mountains, we saw an unknown craft fluttering around with the dexterity of a moth. this craft was at least the size of a two-story house (maybe larger, it is hard to judge size in the desert), and had two strobing lights, one green, one red. it was not a jet, airplane, or helicopter, as it fluttered around the sky like a butterfly. it would alternate directions immediately, dropping and rising 50 feet instantaneously. we observed the ufo for about 2 minutes before it sank below the mountains.

three possibilities immediately entered my mind regarding the ufo:
1. it was an alien spacecraft piloted by aliens.
2. it was an alien spacecraft piloted by military personnel.
3. it was an experimental aircraft reverse engineered utilizing alien technology piloted by military personnel.

five minutes later, the ufo appeared again. it hovered in the air, as if the pilots were skittish���somewhat afraid to be where they were. this sighting was even more exciting as we all were able to fully observe the ufo, its rapid movements making it impossible that this was a man-made craft. after another two minutes, the ufo sank below the mountains. adrenaline pumping, we surveyed our surroundings, spotting stationary headlights behind us on the highway, about a mile or two away. this light did not move. after five minutes, we became nervous and decided to investigate. we drove back and saw a white suv with government plates speed off. relieved to not find leatherface or any other deranged cannibal hillbillies in rusty pickup trucks, we decided to drive back to our observation point (approximately 26 miles southeast of the lil ale inn). 

5-10 minutes passed without any sign of the ufo. it was starting to get late, as i live 2 ��� hours away in las vegas, so i was ready to leave when the ufo hovered in the air once again. this time we all noticed an incredible sight: the mountain range to our left was being illuminated on the other side by a powerful light source intermittently, as if the area 51 base was trying to communicate with the ufo with a sophisticated visual version of morse code. the mountains were silhouetted in light. we were all silent, awestruck at the possibilities. this new sighting made me realize what was happening:

the area 51 base was attempting to communicate with an alien spacecraft utilizing light signals. 

why else would they utilize an enormous light source in such a manner? every time the craft came into view, the light source would illuminate the mountains in an intermittent fashion. when the craft lowered, the light source would stop. it almost seemed as if the lights somehow reassured the ufo to not fly away. we could not tell if the ufo ever landed or not, as the mountain range blocked our view of the ground and area 51.

we stayed another 15 minutes, observing the ufo twice more. the lights from the base strobed even more powerful as the ufo fluttered around. it was obvious that we were observing something important, beyond our understanding. was this the first time that this communication has taken place, or has this been going on years or decades and they are trying to refine their methods of communication? so many questions swirled around my mind, though the overwhelming feeling was one of awe and excitement. there is not a doubt in my mind that i witnessed an alien spacecraft. i plan on going back and camping out on a mountain overlooking the restricted zone boundary, and packing a video camera, telescope, and binoculars!

overall, we observed the ufo for over a half hour, 5 sightings in all, about 2 minutes at a time. i was not drunk or high, nor was my wife or sister. i have completed 190 credits hours in college courses, my wife has a master���s degree, and my sister attends george washington university. we are all in agreement that we have witnessed a ufo.
content.summary: Area 51 communicates with an ufo

content.detailedDescription: Driveing back to work from lunch i was on the back shore, atlantic rd. when i spotted the object over the ocean traveling at a high rate of speed, the silver disk like object had what seemed to be a tail or smoke following it. it soon disapeared.  monday morning i read the gloucester times and read reports from others the next day
content.summary: Silver disk like with a tail
